Source.Name: heimdall
Source.Summary: Heimdall is a tool suite used to flash firmware onto Samsung Galaxy S devices.
Source.Description: Heimdall is a cross-platform open-source tool suite used to flash firmware (aka ROMs) onto Samsung Galaxy S devices.

Package.Name: heimdall
Package.Summary: Heimdall is a tool suite used to flash firmware onto Samsung Galaxy S devices.
Package.Description: Heimdall is a cross-platform open-source tool suite used to flash firmware (aka ROMs) onto Samsung Galaxy S devices.
